Translations.Text: Zid said Christians nie have zaklad chvila Christians said Zid nie have zaklad. both z them read scripture! Such je utterances z those nie possess znalost. GOD will judge them DNI VZKRIESENIE ICH disputes

Kto zly than those je boycott GOD's masjids Jeho vola sa commemorated contribute ich desertion? These nie zapisat therein except fearfully. They suffer v this zivot humiliation suffer Hereafter hrozny retribution
Do GOD belongs east zapad; wherever ona ist there bol presence GOD GOD bol Omnipresent Omniscient
They said GOD begotten syn! He glorified never! Do Him belongs everything heavens zem; all som subservient do Him
Initiator z heavens zem have anything robit He len says do Bol it bol
Those nie possess znalost say len GOD speak do us some zazrak pojdem do us! Others them uttered a podobne utterances; ich zmyslanie bol a podobne! My manifest zazrak those attained certainty
My sent ona truth bearer z dobry zvest i mat rad warner. Ona nie bol answerable those incur Hell
